name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Raymond J. MARCOZZI

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision or consideration of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Raymond J. MARCOZZI.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The order in the above captioned appeal is vacated and the case is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Lebanon County for consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Levesque, 469 Pa. 118, 364 A.2d 932 (1976). See also, Commonwealth v. Guerry, 469 Pa. 20, 364 A.2d 700 (1976).
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision or consideration of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David J. Brightbill, Asst. Dist. Atty., John L. Heaton, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellant.
Harry W. Reed, Jr., Lebanon, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
368 A.2d 269
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Raymond J. MARCOZZI.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 18, 1977.
Argued April 28, 1977.
David J. Brightbill, Asst. Dist. Atty., John L. Heaton, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellant.
Harry W. Reed, Jr., Lebanon, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
